question: What version of the game were you playing?
Were you playing single player or multiplayer?
Was this a softcore or hardcore character?
How long did it take to go from level 1 to level 99?
answer: It took 789 Hours over the span of 15 months which averages out to be about 1.75 hours per day. This includes leveling a Smiter to obtain torches.

question: How long did it take to go from level 98 to level 99?
answer: It took 175 hours and about 5000 Chaos Sanctuary runs. Note that I saved my Ancients Quests to complete at level 98, so if you don't do that, it will take longer.

question: How did you keep track of all the drops?
answer: Each time a unique, set, or rune dropped, I manually entered it into a spreadsheet.

question: Did you obtain all the holy grail items?
answer: No, there were 15 holy grail items I did not obtain.

question: Did you obtain all the runes?
When did you start playing Diablo II?
answer: I started playing when it first came out in 2000.

question: Is this the first time you reached level 99?
Will you ever get another character to level 99 in the future?
How did you get the runes for Infinity?
What strategy did you use to gain exp?
answer: I started by making a classic character and beating Hell in order to avoid completing my Ancients Quests. Then I converted my character to an expansion character and ran Chaos Sanctuary many times. At level 98 I completed Ancients Quests in Normal, Nightmare, and Hell.
